about_the_game:
Fly the "Porsche of the skies"! Experience a new feel for flying with the Mooney M20J by the famous Carenado development team. Set new speed records.

This FSX version includes a highly detailed interior and exterior model, full moving and animated rudder and flaps, light effects and also a brilliant interactive virtual cockpit. The Mooney is the perfect aircraft for VFR and IFR flights! The ultra realistic performance is based on a detailed documentation and observation of experienced Mooney pilots.

Features:
  • Special FSX-Features (Dynamic shadows, specular mapping, bloom lights)
  • Four different Liveries with maximum details and realistic textures
  • Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Many animated parts: Doors, ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels
  • Full dynamic effects and reflections (shines over the body and panel, nightlights)
  • 3D modelled pilot and cockpit area
  • Many details as: Pitot pressure chamber, antennas, fuel tank.... etc.
  • Custom panel and gauges with realistic lighting (day and night)
  • Full checklist and reference text about the Flight Dynamics
  • Realistic performance based on Mooney's documents and experienced Piper's pilot observations
  • Real weight and balance

The Mooney is the perfect aircraft for VFR and IFR flights! The ultra realistic performance is based on a detailed documentation and observation of experienced Mooney pilots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: Fly the "Porsche of the skies"! Eperience a new feel for flying with the Mooney M20J by the famous Carenado development team. Set new speed records.
